meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to put; to place それをテーブルの上に置きなさい。Lay it on the table.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to leave (behind) あいにく私はカメラを家においてきた。As it happens, I have left the camera at home.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to establish (an organization, a facility, a position, etc.); to set up

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to appoint (someone to a certain position); to hire; to employ

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to place (one's trust, one's faith, etc.); to bear (in mind, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to put down a tool (e.g. a pen) hence stopping what one is doing with that tool

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to take in (boarders, etc.); to provide lodging in one's house

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to separate spatially or temporally

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Auxiliary verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to do something in advance Usually written using kana alone, after the -te form of a verb遊びたいならちゃんとルールを決めておきなさい。If we're going to play, make your mind up about the rules!

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Auxiliary verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to leave something in a certain state; to keep something in a certain state Usually written using kana alone, after the -te form of a verb問題を未解決のままにしておくのはいけません。You mustn't leave your problems unsolved.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ku' ending, Auxiliary verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to leave something in a certain state; to keep something in a certain state Usually written using kana alone, after the -te form of a verb問題を未解決のままにしておくのはいけません。You mustn't leave your problems unsolved.

sentences.translation: As it happens, I have left the camera at home.
If we're going to play, make your mind up about the rules!
You mustn't leave your problems unsolved.

meanings.meaning: 1. leaving behind; desertion; abandonment usu. as 置き去りにする
置去り 【おきざり】

置去り 【おきざり】

置きかえる 【おきかえる】、置き替える 【おきかえる】

置きかえる 【おきかえる】、置き替える 【おきかえる】

置忘れる 【おきわすれる】
1. to leave behind; to misplace; to forget
置忘れる 【おきわすれる】

置時計 【おきどけい】

置時計 【おきどけい】

1. walking off with someone's bag; luggage theft 誰かにバッグを置き引きされました。Somebody swiped my bag.
2. luggage thief
置引き 【おきびき】
1. place to put something; storage space; storehouse; depository; repository; shed; yard
置場 【おきば】
1. ornament; decorative object; object placed in a tokonoma
2. figurehead; leader without real power
置き物 【おきもの】
置き物: Irregular okurigana usage.
1. every ...; every other ...; at intervals of ...; with ... in between; ... apart Usually written using kana alone, after a distance, time period, number of objects, etc.
1. I wish I had ...; I should have ...; it would have been better if I had ... Usually written using kana alone, usu. verb-て...その映画を見ておけばよかったなあ。I wish I had seen the film.
置けば良かった 【おけばよかった】

sentences.translation: I wish I had seen the film.

meanings.type: Expressions (phrases, clauses, etc.), I-Adjective (keiyoushi) - yoi/ii class
meanings.meaning: 1. it's OK to ...; it's best to ...; it's alright to ... Usually written using kana alone, usu. verb-て...彼に頼っておけばいい。You can rely on him.
置けば良い 【おけばいい】、置けばよい 【おけばよい】、置けば良い 【おけばよい】
1. handicap go; game of go played with a handicap Go (game), See also 置き石
2. Go handicaps Within most systems and at most levels, handicap is given... Read more
置き碁 【おきご】
1. leaving someone behind; abandoning someone; marooning someone See also 置いてけぼり おいてけぼり
1. stand; base; platform; holder; rest
置台 【おきだい】
1. earth taken from elsewhere and placed atop
1. place to put something; storage space
1. Oki
1. Oku
1. Okito
1. place; position; location 彼の事務所は町の中心部に位置している。His office is located in the center of the town.
2. position; standing; status; situation その位置に誰を選ぶか考えがありますか。Do you have any idea who we should single out for the position?
3. Position (vector) In geometry, a "position", "location", or "radius vector"... Read more
位地 【いち】
位地: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: His office is located in the center of the town.
Do you have any idea who we should single out for the position?

2. medical treatment

2. installation (of a machine or equipment) ようやく各店舗に監視カメラが設置されることになった。Eventually it was decided that the stores be equipped with surveillance cameras.

sentences.translation: Eventually it was decided that the stores be equipped with surveillance cameras.
